divs: Sighting DetailsI am a MUFON member and work as a security guard at the Vail Valley MedicalCenter. I had just gotten home from work at 630PM and was going back to my truckwhen I looked up and saw the object. Being a MUFON member and having had UFOsightings in the past I often scan the skies. I noticed a round object thatappeared about the size of a 18 BB at arms length. It was silverywhite in colorand was moving slowly to the southeast, away from me. At one point it appearedto slow to a stop, before continueing to the southeast where it eventuallyfaded. I did have a chance to grab my 35mm camera and took two pictures usingthe telephoto setting, which unfortunately is not real powerful. At first Ithought it might be a large balloon, and as there was no appreciable wind at thetime I could not be sure. There were a few wispy clouds that did not appear tobe moving while I watched the object. About 20-30 minutes after my sighting thewind did pick up and I could see wispy clouds moving to the northeast, at aright angle to the direction I saw the object going. Duration of the sightingwas about 5-6 minutes from 633PM to 638PM.
Summary: Sighted a silverywhite round object in daylight
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Vail
There were no other sightings in Vail on or around June 21st 2003
